cleaned_text: Illinois HFS - Medicaid and Child Support Welcome to the Illinois Department of Healthcare and Family Services Welcome to the Illinois Department of Healthcare and Family Services HFS Mission We work together to help Illinoisans access high quality health care and fulfill child support obligations to advance their physical, mental, and financial well-being. Announcements COVID testing and vaccines are free in Illinois - get yours today. Find [vaccination sites](https://www.vaccines.gov/) near you and [learn more](https://coronavirus.illinois.gov/all-in-illinois.html) about going all-in to get through this together. Transportation to vaccination sites is free. If you are a Medicaid customer or are uninsured and you have been asked to pay out of pocket for a COVID test or vaccine, please [click here and call for assistance](/coronavirus.html). For our Providers: Many recent Provider Notices include information on the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19).
